phrases: I sort of got dizzy as I was going through the steps...
How did she end up being the heroine?
I am a better actor, and my face is cuter, too.
A Kind Girl Who Is not Kind
All right, that will be enough.
I am hot after all that practicing.
Hina-chan, you are wearing that practice outfit?
That is the one I lent you, right?
In any case, you really do have remarkable proportions.
I am glad I asked you to be the heroine.
What good will it do to try any harder?!
All right, now we will work on the steps for part 2.
She cannot even get this down?
How can she play the heroine if she cannot master something this basic?
If you just stay relaxed, you will do fine.
Chiaki-senpai will not look at anyone but that girl!
I respect Chiaki-senpai so much more than she does!
Okay, once more from the top.
Want to go to the nurse's office, just to be safe?
But I am all choked up...
You and I only just became friends!
For crying out loud, stop shaking me!
Just try not to overdo it.
That will be all for our group practice.
You should all practice on your own now.
I have to work harder so Chiaki-senpai will recognize my abilities!
Do you want to practice with us?
I thought it would be more fun if we practiced together.
There is me and Kuu-chan and...
Wh-Why should I practice with you?
And for the next step, do this...
When I see her up close like this,
she is actually pretty devoted to learning.
She is clumsy, but at least she is eager.
What do you think you are... doing...
She may be eager, but she is still a failure.
Okay, that is all for today.
I am sure it was for you.
I am never going to practice with you again.
Do not you Why not? me!
I am all banged up after all the times you knocked me over!
But I admit that you are eager
Thanks for lending me your practice outfit today!
I got sweaty, so I will wash it before I return it.
It is old, but you can keep it if you like.
I am never going to approve of you!
What should we do for the cultural fair?
Or there is always the classic haunted house.
I wonder what did be best.
We have to all think of something by tomorrow...
If it involves food, will there be rice balls?
What are we going to display?
If we do a display, it will be easy but it is sort of lonely...
Then again, if we do a cafe, the preparations will be hard...
I wonder what kind of cafe...
Okay, time to clean the store.
It has all kinds of different practice methods.
There is even a way to practice by becoming animals.
Would a bird look something like this?
Hina-chan, how is the cleaning... going...
It does not look like one?
Why are you imitating a bird, anyway?
so I always bump into people.
I was hoping to do something about it.
Would not a bird look more like this?
Do it like you are actually going to fly!
Were not you guys in the middle of cleaning?
We practice that way in the theater club sometimes, too.
It broadens your range of expressions.
Would you give us a demonstration, then?
I want to see that, too!
For example, a cat would look like this.
A dog would look like this.
You mimic their behaviors and try to capture their unique characteristics.
Why does this seem just the slightest bit erotic?
Hina-chan, why do not you try imitating something?
I want to see you imitate a rabbit!
It is sure to be adorable!
Was this a quiz of some kind?
That is what rabbits really sound like!
They make that noise when they attack you!
Some animals have cute faces, but are actually vicious.
Come to think of it, a guard dog my family used to have
had a cute face, but a really scary bark.
I am not sure I can get it right...
Wait, but you said it was scary.
What was that an imitation of?
It was the dog leaping at an intruder and saying, I will kill you!
You do not keep any pets here in the store?
Shop pets are popular these days.
What kinds of animals were around in your hometown?
It would have been perfect if there were bears and wild boars, too.
I do not think that would go over well at this store.
No, they taste really good in hotpot.
You keep them on the premise of eating them?
You have seen all different kinds of real animals, huh, Hina-chan?
Then why not try to recall them while you practice?
You seemed to be soaring like a bird.
You think I can perform at Suzuran now?
That is jumping the gun a bit...
Come to think of it, I have heard she lives at a used bookstore.
There is one week left until the culture festival.
We have got all of our costumes and props together.
The one thing I am concerned about is...
Keep your eyes forward during practice!
If you keep that up, I will never approve of you as the heroine!
Hina-chan's movements are still as stiff as ever.
I could not get my acting right today, either.
I bet Yua-chan hates me now...
I wonder how you can stop bumping into her.
Maybe by just looking around you?
I just cannot seem to see anything around me when I am focused on acting.
But when I become conscious of my surroundings,
I get nervous and become a scarecrow...
How about squinting while you act
so that you are only somewhat aware of your surroundings?
That would take both my hands...
Then how about wearing a cute mask?
Hina-chan, I will practice with you.
Have you been practicing for the play?
Why do not you practice at the park?
She can never play the heroine at that rate!
I will have to tell her
I am going to feed the ducks.
There is lots of room, so I can practice without bumping into anyone!
Hina-chan, were you practicing dancing earlier?
In that case, I think it would be best for you to learn from Mayu-chan.
She always practices so she can dance with a prince someday.
You are really small and cute, Mayu-chan.
You could get a princess role easily!
A-As far as that goes, you are cute, too, Hina-chan...
I would step on the prince's feet,
or trip and end up tackling him.
That would not be a dance.
It would be a fighting competition.
I need to learn how to dance without bumping into people soon!
Then maybe you should try to be more aware of your center of gravity.
Like if you put something on your head
and try to walk without dropping it.
This is the same posture I am in when I become a scarecrow!
I never thought my talent as a scarecrow would come in handy!
Did being complimented make you so happy, you had to cry?
I think the dancing should work out.
Do you have any advice for her, Aki-chan?
Anything she can use to improve her acting?
Th-Then, is there anything she can keep in mind when she is on the stage?
Maybe to take advantage of the pauses left by your co-actors?
How can I get the hang of reading their pauses?
Wh-Why do not we start by going over your lines?
Oh, that is a good idea.
You cannot act if you do not know your lines.
I am a bit more confident about my lines!
I have been reading the script with Toritarou every day!
Okay, can you act out the heroine's part in the beginning of the first chapter?
I once had someone important that I wished to protect
I once had someone precious that I wished to protect!
This person was more precious to me than my own life
This person was more important to me than my own life,
Wh-What kind of crazy cheat skill is that?
It is been five years since that person died
Well, ready to head back home?
I want to practice just a bit longer!
I want to conquer my stage fright with this play!
I want to change so I will not be a failshrimp anymore!
Let us keep working just a bit longer, then.
When all is said and done, she is serious about this.
I have got the basics of the dancing down,
and I have memorized all the lines through the first chapter.
I still have more work to do on acting, quick changing, voice projection,
But I am better than I was before!
I think this might work out!
Do you actually think you will be ready for the culture festival at this rate?
I will not allow you to mess up any play that I am in!
Since it is come to this...
I will just train you personally!
We are going to make this play a success!
Wait, how long have you been here?
-Prefixes and suffixes -A prefix is an affix placed in front of a word to modify its meaning.
ex) ex (outside) in express, and inter (between) in interview.
-A suffix is a morpheme added at the end of a word to form a derivative.
ex) ish in boyish (making it an adjective) -Prefixes that express numbers.
-uni = 1. Examples) uniform = uni+form->one piece of clothing unicycle = uni+cycle->unicycle universe = uni+verse->
Space, the whole world -multi = many Examples) multinational = multi+national->many countries multipurpose = multi+purpose->many uses media = multi + media->multimedia, using various forms of media
Gulp, gulp Dribble, dribble, dribble -Question: Circle the correct word for the following definitions.

1: Impossible to do: A) able B) unable C) enable 2: A vehicle with three wheels: A) bicycle B) tricycle C) unicycle -Suffixes that create adjectives: - -ful: <verb or noun + ful> turns it into an adjective meaning filled with !
Examples) powerful = power+ful->powerful, strong hopeful = hopeful = hope+ful->filled with hope -If you add -ful to a container noun, it becomes a noun indicating 1 (container) worth.
Examples) glassful 1 glass worth spoonful 1 spoon worth saucerful 1 saucer worth
Practice with Yua-chan was really tough.
We have still got a lot to do!
I cannot have you keeling over on me now!
I will try my best with you, Yua-chan!
I thought maybe you hated me now,
D-Do not get the wrong idea!
This is all for the play!
I will keep working my very hardest!
Okay, I am going to do my best!
Together with Yua-chan and everyone else!
Maids, Ghosts, and the Stage of Dreams
I swear, you are such a handful, it is ridiculous.
But you are serious about this, and you are eager, if nothing else.
I am willing to admit that much, at least.
Show'them everything I taught you, and leave nothing out!
Next time, Maids, Ghosts, and the Stage of Dreams.
